_source.short_desc: #1 all-in-one EHS platform to solve ALL your safety requirements. Simple for workers to use, simple for managers to customize. Try now
_source.long_desc: The #1 all-in-one EHS platform. Choose from 30+ apps to create a solution for your organization, including COVID-19 management solutions! Donesafe is Health, Safety, and Environment management software that connects your management system from workers in the field to the management team in the boardroom. Donesafe makes it fast and easy to access, enter and report data in real-time. A modern, fresh online platform that works on any device, including an offline native iOS and Android app. Try now
_source.target_audience: Donesafe works with companies ranging from small businesses up to enterprises across all industries looking to move from paper, spreadsheets or clunky and disconnected tech solutions.

related_products.short_desc: NOW: Starting @ $49/m for the WHOLE company, Contractor Foreman is the most affordable solution for small and medium sized contractors.
related_products.features: NOW: Starting @ $49/m for the WHOLE company, Contractor Foreman is the most affordable all-in-one solution for small and medium trade and general contractors who want a better way to manage their projects. *FREE Trial + 100 Day Guarantee* Easy to use and rated as a Top App and Best Value.  Save thousands compared to other systems. Integrates with QuickBooks.  Use it on the phone, tablet, and computer.  Time Cards, Estimates, Online Payments, Daily Logs, Scheduling, and 35 other great features.

related_products.short_desc: Complete all your safety forms and documents on mobile devices from the field. Login online to track and monitor safety activity.
related_products.features:
Most intuitive Safety Software with world class Analytics and In-App Chat.

The easiest way to manage your entire safety program from mobile apps and the web. SiteDocs features a custom form builder, PDF document library, worker certification management, offline-mode, and more. SiteDocs will help you easily manage your safety program while saving you time and helping you maintain the highest standard of safety possible.

related_products.short_desc: ServiceTitan is the leading business software that's changing the way residential and commercial septic companies do business.
related_products.features: ServiceTitan is the leading all-in-one software solution for residential and commercial septic businesses. With powerful tools that improve sales, supercharge your team, and provide real-time insights, ServiceTitan is trusted by more than 100,000 service professionals and by the world's best companies. Get a customized demo to see how ServiceTitan can help YOUR business grow.

related_products.short_desc: iAuditor puts the power in your teams' hands. Every person and every device can be a window to your worksite.
related_products.features: Safety is now a core component of brand reputation across every industry. Everyone has the right to expect a safe experience so businesses must prioritise the safety of their people and customers, with clear lines of communication that make everyone an active participant. With iAuditor you can share inspection reports with your stakeholders and other teams just by clicking a button. This commitment of adopting a safety culture holds the key to getting the world safely back to business.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify your EHS management operations and streamline business processes with HIPAA-compliant smart mobile form apps for the field.
related_products.features: Streamline your business processes and seamlessly integrate with your safety system of record. Our no-code app field team platform enables you to develop HIPAA-compliant EHS forms tailored to meet each job's unique compliance requirements and keep field technicians safe. Enterprise-grade analytics tools create insightful and interactive dashboards to help you predict potential risks before they occur, and respond faster when they do, with accelerated data sharing and incident reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Digitize your EHS&S forms and workflows using the #1 no code mobile-cloud platform. Get transparent compliance today.
related_products.features:
Establish a safe and efficient work environment, minimize risk, and meet compliance standards. Completely digitize your Environmental, Health, Safety and Sustainability data collection and processes with our cloud solution.

Our solution is mobile, offline capable, beautiful reports, KPIs, repeat items, automatic email notifications and more.

Incidents, Audits & Inspections, Actions & Tasks, Work, Observations, Sustainability, Safety Meetings, Go Mobile, Use Best Practices

related_products.short_desc: Multichannel emergency communication software that provides two-way messaging, integrated threat intelligence, and safety monitoring.
related_products.features: AlertMedia is the world's leading emergency communication provider. Our award-winning, two-way multichannel messaging system, fully integrated threat intelligence, and employee safety monitoring capabilities helps organizations protect their business and people through all phases of an emergency. Implementation and personalized 24/7 support are included and our intuitive platform takes just 15 minutes to learn.

related_products.short_desc: The Most Trusted EHS Enterprise Software for Assuring Client Success for Over 30 years.
related_products.features: Cority is the most trusted EHS software for assuring top performing organizations' success. Cority's comprehensive SaaS platform helps organizations securely manage EHS information across departments, regions and the globe. Over 1,300 enterprise organizations in 77 countries trust Cority to ensure global compliance, mitigate risk, standardize procedures, drive operational excellence and keep employees safe, healthy and productive.

related_products.short_desc: Integrated QHSE management system software, Cloud-based, helping SMB's manage compliance activities in a single, easy to use solution.
related_products.features:
Mango helps control and maintain all aspects of your quality, health,  safety (QHSE) management system(s); including: policies, procedures & forms (with single-source document control); accidents & incidents; Audits/Inspections; Improvements (NCR's, CAPA's, etc.); hazard & risk management; and people management (competencies & training).

In addition, Mango helps our customers manage their Plant & Equipment (including scheduled maintenance and requests), Food Safety, & compliance calendar.

related_products.short_desc: Partners in compliance and management systems excellence. Learn more about our intuitive applications serving the full-spectrum of EHS.
related_products.features: Benchmark ESG | Gensuite EHS Management Software helps organizations comply with regulations, improve safety processes, reduce environmental impact, and boost sustainability measures. Benchmark offers an entire suite of EHS applications that are user-friendly, robust, and highly configurable to meet the needs of the EHS front line and growing organizational needs. For over two decades, our senior leadership team has worked in the EHS industry building EHS solutions for Fortune 100 companies.

related_products.short_desc: Safesite is a powerful, easy-to-use safety management solution proven to reduce workplace incidents by up to 57%.
related_products.features: Proven to reduce incidents by up to 57%, Safesite is a powerful, easy-to-use safety management solution used by over 18,000 companies of all sizes and industries. Safesite's intuitive platform helps companies streamline EHS management programs, get results and demonstrate safety performance. Access the platform on any device and run your safety program digitally, saving hours each week and cutting related costs by 20% annually.

similar_products.short_desc: Get the best EHS software available today. Everything you need to manage Health & Safety, Sustainability, Risk, and Compliance.
similar_products.features: EHS Insight is the best value in EHS Software available today. With a fresh, user-friendly interface and everything you need to automate and improve your EHS Management System, it will be the must-have application of 2022. Don't settle for outdated software or one of those little 'forms' tools. Get a comprehensive solution that includes every feature you can't live without. Trust the industry leader: first with offline access, first with a full-suite mobile application, and first in the cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage all aspects of your EHS program: conduct inspections, assign tasks, manage training, inspect equipment, analyze trends and more.

KPA EHS (formerly iScout) is a cloud-based EHS management software platform designed to help organizations establish and implement a comprehensive safety program, make data-driven decisions, and take real-time action to keep employees safe and compliant.

The easy-to-configure, mobile platform provides a wide range of flexible tools you can tailor to your organization's specific safety and compliance processes.

Intellect's Environmental, Health, Safety and Quality (EHSQ) software is designed to for customers who want one solution for both EH&S and Quality. 

- Easy to use
- Fast to implement
- Highly flexible
- Best-in-class customer support

Intellect EHSQ is available out-of-the-box or configure apps to your unique business needs with our no-code compliance platform.  Reduce operational risk, improve health and safety, attain sustainability, and analyze data to achieve operational excellence.

similar_products.short_desc: The VelocityEHS Accelerate?  Platform makes it easy for you to drive Operational Excellence across your EHS & Sustainability programs.
similar_products.features: VelocityEHS ESG|EHS software is trusted by 1/3 of the Fortune Global 1000 and thousands of companies across industries to manage Environmental, Health, Safety, Sustainability programs. The VelocityEHS Accelerate?  Platform includes capabilities for incident management, risk management, industrial hygiene, safety management, permit to work, chemical management, audits & inspections, action management, training and learning, ergonomics, air, water, waste management, emergency & response services.

Our web and mobile friendly platform boasts more configurable features to reduce effort than any other safety management software suite, guaranteed all aligned to shift from reaction to effective focus on injury prevention. similar_products.short_desc: A mobile-first EHS solution to help you simplify safety, empower your workforce, and proactively minimize risk on-site.
similar_products.features: Alcumus' EHS Management solution is a leading mobile-first safety solution that empowers your front-line workforce to proactively minimize risk on-site. similar_products.short_desc: Monitor leading and lagging indicators, streamline your risk management, and increase workplace safety with a 360-degree EHS solution.

similar_products.short_desc: With over 400 businesses using Evotix, we are transforming the way employees engage in workplace health and safety.
similar_products.features: Are you looking for an effective way to manage health, safety and wellness for your organization? With Evotix you can manage all safety processes in one place, from incident reporting to inspection regimes. You'll also be able to put preventative measures in place to reduce the risk of incidents & injuries occurring. Evotix is designed for mid-sized companies in various industries and can be configured to meet your specific needs. See how you can achieve compliance & improve your EHS processes.

similar_products.short_desc: Be the solution. Recognize the true cost of carbon.
similar_products.features: Accelerate your company's path to Net Zero with Salesforce Sustainability Cloud and Customer 360 solutions. Analyzing carbon emissions from energy usage and company travel can be daunting and time-consuming. With all your data flowing directly onto one platform, you can efficiently quantify your carbon footprint across Scope 1, 2 and 3 emissions. Track energy patterns and emission trends, then evaluate environmental impact with rich data visualization and dashboards.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Emissions Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Emissions Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Emissions Management software helps organizations forecast future emissions, calculate the actual output, manage market transactions and ensure compliance with regional, state and national regulations. Features of this software include market evaluation, emissions reduction planning, automatic CO2 calculations and permit level maintenance.

related_categories.meta_description: Environmental software, sometimes called environmental management systems (EMS), helps organizations with the tracking, reporting, and enforcement of internal environmental policies as well as compliance with government regulations. It can assist with incorporating environmental concerns into risk management programs.
related_categories.description: Environmental software, sometimes called environmental management systems (EMS), helps organizations with the tracking, reporting and enforcement of internal environmental policies as well as compliance with government regulations. It can assist with incorporating environmental concerns into risk management programs. Environmental software, is related to EHS Management software, Emissions Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Facility Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Facility Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Facility Management software enables organizations to more effectively administer facility and plant assets. Details such as building layouts, assets, employees, and square footage are recorded and made readily accessible. Facility Management solutions allow for easy access to drawings and schematics, room scheduling, preventative maintenance tasks, work orders, and records for equipment including lighting, security, HVAC, elevators, and fire alarms. Facility Management software is related to Fixed Asset Management software, Building Maintenance software, Equipment Maintenance software, HVAC software, Maintenance Management software, EHS Management software, Visitor Management software, and Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Quality Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Quality Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Quality Management software automates the process of tracking and minimizing product defects. Organizations use these applications to monitor and control product quality. Through the collection and analysis of data from users, organizations can identify, isolate and correct unforeseen product defects or other issues that may emerge in the course of production. Quality Management solutions also provide tools to evaluate the effectiveness of notification campaigns, recalls and repair attempts. QMS also aids in maintaining product compliance with applicable international regulations. Quality Management software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software and Product Lifecycle Management software.
